metadata.title: Oxyware - Web & App Development
metadata.description: Oxyware creates modern websites, apps, and technology solutions to help businesses grow.

portfolio.title: Examples
portfolio.description: This website is a modern portfolio platform that presents projects professionally, highlighting visual quality, usability, and interactivity. Visitors can explore each project in detail and have an immersive experience.

projects.carsDescription: Website project for a car dealership with modern layout, images of sports cars, SUVs, and sedans, promotion sections, test drive booking, and red & white design.
projects.realEstateDescription: Complete real estate system showcasing properties, search filters, detailed property pages, and client contact integration, with a clean and professional layout.

q1.question: How much does a website cost?
q1.answer: The price of a website depends on its complexity, features, and desired design. Simple websites are usually cheaper; more complex projects with advanced functionalities and integrations may cost more.

q2.question: How long does it take to create a website?
q2.answer: The development time depends on the project. A simple website can be completed in weeks, while more complex projects may take 2-8 months, including design, development, and testing.

q3.question: What results should I expect?
q3.answer: A professional website should improve your online presence, convey credibility, generate leads, and engage visitors. Specific results may vary depending on the applied marketing and SEO strategy.

q4.question: Do you offer support after the website launch?
q4.answer: Yes! We offer ongoing support, maintenance, and updates to ensure your website works correctly and stays up-to-date with the best security and performance practices.

footer.companyDescription: Turning ideas into innovative digital solutions. Smart code, real impact.

about.description: OxyWare was born from a passion to transform ideas into innovative digital solutions that make a real impact in the business world.

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: Founded with the mission of making cutting-edge technology accessible to everyone, our company was born from a passion for innovation and smart solutions.
history.paragraph2: Focusing on modern web development and high-performance digital applications, we transform ideas into impactful digital experiences.
history.paragraph3: Each project is an opportunity to combine design, functionality, and efficiency, delivering solutions that not only meet current needs but anticipate the future.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Transform ideas into digital solutions that revolutionize businesses and connect people through technology.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Be a reference in technological innovation, creating the digital future with solutions that make a difference.

values.title: Values
values.description: Excellence, innovation, transparency, and commitment to the success of our clients and partners.

arthur.name: Arthur Rodrigo
arthur.description: "As a developer passionate about technology and innovation, I created OxyWare with the purpose of helping companies and entrepreneurs materialize their digital visions. I believe technology should be a growth catalyst, and that’s what we deliver in every project."
